name: utmONE Scholars: Building Global Justice
description: This course focuses on themes of social justice, global change, and conflict through the lens of multiple disciplines. Through the exploration of concepts such as class, race, gender, religion, culture, and power on a global level, students will be involved in assignments and small group activities that develop and refine key skills that contribute to student success in university courses. [24S] This course is open to high achieving first-year students only. All interested students must apply and a select group of academically successful students will be accepted into utmONE Scholars. The application can be found here: http://uoft.me/scholars
exclusions: UTM111H5, UTM112H5, UTM113H5, UTM114H5, UTM115H5, UTM116H5, UTM117H5, UTM118H5, UTM190H5, UTM191H5, UTM192H5, UTM193H5, UTM194H5, UTM195H5, UTM197H5
